item.title: Block Coding with Minecraft Part 1 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This five-class sequence introduces the students to fundamental computer science concepts, including events and coordinates. Students will use a coding environment embedded in Minecraft Education to code their own commands, which they will then use in the game. Leveraging the engaging world of Minecraft Education, students will: Explore a custom coding environment integrated within the game Learn to write and execute their own commands Apply coding principles to manipulate the Minecraft world in real-time Develop problem-solving skills through interactive challenges Gain hands-on experience with spatial reasoning and algorithmic thinking By the end of the course, students will have a solid foundation in basic programming concepts, enhanced creativity, and improved logical reasoning skillsâ€”all while enjoying the familiar and exciting Minecraft platform.

item.title: Junior Robotics Adventures | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Embark on an exciting year-long robotics adventure for young learners! This class combines two engaging programs to introduce basic robotics concepts through fun, themed challenges. Fall Semester: Jurassic Journey with Sphero indi Explore the prehistoric world using Sphero indi robots Learn basic coding concepts through hands-on activities Navigate dinosaur-themed mazes and challenges Develop problem-solving skills in a playful environment Spring Semester: First Lego League Explore Dive into the world of Lego robotics Participate in the official First Lego League Explore program Work on collaborative projects with peers Learn about real-world applications of robotics and engineering Throughout the year, students will: Gain hands-on experience with different robotic platforms Develop critical thinking and teamwork skills Boost creativity through themed challenges and projects Build a strong foundation for future STEM learning This class is perfect for budding engineers and curious minds ready to take their first steps into the world of robotics!

item.title: Math Excellence | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: In our advanced math class, we harness the engaging and comprehensive materials from Beast Academy to cultivate a deep understanding and passion for mathematics. Each student embarks on a personalized mathematical journey under the guidance of an expert Blue Ridge Boost instructor. Class Structure Introduction: Each session begins with a concise lesson introducing new concepts and exercise types. Guided Practice: Students then apply these concepts through hands-on problem-solving, with instructor support readily available.
